wallabag.description:
wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages.

Based on the official wallabag docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/wallabag/wallabag/.

/var/www/wallabag/data.description: Choose a Share for the database. Eg: create a Share called wallabag-db for this purpose.
/var/www/wallabag/data.label: Database

/var/www/wallabag/web/assets/images.description: Choose a Share for images and such. Eg: create a Share called wallabag-assets for this purpose.
/var/www/wallabag/web/assets/images.label: Assets

SYMFONY__ENV__FROM_EMAIL.label: Mail sender
SYMFONY__ENV__FROM_EMAIL.description: defaults to wallabag@example.com, the address wallabag uses for outgoing emails

SYMFONY__ENV__TWOFACTOR_SENDER.label: Twofactor email sender
SYMFONY__ENV__TWOFACTOR_SENDER.description: defaults to no-reply@wallabag.org, the address wallabag uses for two-factor emails

SYMFONY__ENV__FOSUSER_REGISTRATION.label: Allow user registration
SYMFONY__ENV__FOSUSER_REGISTRATION.description: Defaults to true. Set to false to disable public user registration

SYMFONY__ENV__DOMAIN_NAME.label: Domain name
SYMFONY__ENV__DOMAIN_NAME.description: Public domain name wallabag should assume (including protocol)
